snippet.title: Android Kotlin YouTube: How to load web pages with WebView (Ep 6)
snippet.description:
Learn how to load web pages through a component called WebView in Android. It's very easy to set up, we'll go through how to load the page for a course lesson from our CourseDetailActivity. Enjoy.
